a.title: Learn more about Baldwin-Woodville Area School District
a.span: Go to Baldwin-Woodville Area School District Information

div.p: The mission of the Baldwin-Woodville Area School District is to create a safe, productive, and respectful learning environment that will meet the needs of all students to be lifelong learners. The District will provide the facilities and resources necessary for students to become successful and productive members of society.
Please CLICK HERE for the latest message from Superintendent Russell on the Corona Virus.
